text: Hi there, I'm Yosef Velazquez, student on Computer Science master here in México :flag-mx:. I'm still very naive with Julia, but the language has catched my breath, I would like to improve Julia library in probabilistic resources, specifically Graphical Probabilistics Models, which is a one of my research fields. Just a Quick Question, Julia webpage guideline says we are encouraged to contact our proposed mentor, but I wasn't able to find any section for mentors listing and contact information.  Do I start my draft proposal on Google Docs or do I have to wait for a mentor?
